channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung Makes New $490 Offer To Galaxy S25 Buyers
item.description: Samsung is giving away another major freebie to Galaxy S25 Ultra fans.

item.title: Black Hole Mission: The Trillion-Dollar Quest To Test Einstein
item.description: An interstellar mission to send a tiny spacecraft to the nearest black hole is not out of reach, according to a new report from scientists.
